upcoming.title: Digital Diplomacy Summit 2026
upcoming.description: Join us for an immersive summit exploring digital diplomacy, AI in governance, and youth leadership in the digital age. Applications open until March 10th.

past.title: New Diplomacy Conference 2025
past.description: A full-day forum on conflict resolution, multilateral cooperation, and youth-driven policy innovation.

past.title: Intercultural Communication in the Modern World
past.description: An interactive seminar exploring the dynamics of cross-cultural communication and international dialogue skills.

past.title: Borders and Brinkmanship: A New Pakistan-Türkiye Strategic Axis
past.description: A policy forum on turning border crises into a stable Pakistan–Türkiye strategic axis.

past.title: The Role of Youth and Civil Society in Resolving Conflicts
past.description: A practicum where young leaders and CSOs shared hands-on tools for mediation and digital dialogue.
